channel.title: How do I make custom npcs? And change Npc attack rate?
channel.description:
Well I have 2 questions please respond if you can.
I need to know how to make custom npcs like someone called fr33st00fn00b and then add armor onto him and stuff.
Then I need to know how to make monsters attack rate higher. I wasn't even hit by my kbd at LEVEL 3!!!
